home.introduction:
Hallo und herzlich Willkommen bei TableFlip!
Dein Fachgeschäft für Sammelkarten jeglicher Art und Anime Merchandise. 
 Bitte wähle dein TCG aus um mehr zu unserem Angebot zu erfahren.

about.title: About Us
about.default:
TableFlip is your specialist store for all kinds of trading cards and anime merchandise. We offer a wide range of products, including:
- Pokémon cards
- Yu-Gi-Oh! cards
- Magic: The Gathering cards
- Digimon cards
- Dungeons & Dragons accessories
- Star Wars cards
- Anime figures and merchandise

Our team consists of passionate collectors and experts who are happy to help you choose the right products. Whether you are an experienced collector or just starting out, we have something for everyone.
about.invitation: In addition to our extensive range, we also regularly host events and tournaments where you can show off your skills and meet new people. Take a look at our events page to find out more. We look forward to welcoming you to our store!

cookies.prompt: To access this content, you need to agree to the use of cookies. Do you want to accept cookies?
cookies.declineText: You have declined the use of cookies. Some features of this website may not work as intended.
